content.first_paragraph: Founded by Sofia GalvÃ£o, Sofia GalvÃ£o Group was born out of a passion for offering quality real estate solutions. With extensive experience in the sector, our team is committed to providing a personalised and transparent consultancy service. We believe that every property transaction is an opportunity to build lasting relationships and help our clients achieve their goals.
content.second_paragraph: Since 2022, we have been part of KW Portugal's Top 20 of the most productive consultants in the whole country, and we are in the top 3 at KW Lead Santos, thus making us part of the Associate Leadership Council (ALC), a committee of consultants that supports business strategy at a local level.
content.third_paragraph: We are part of the 3rd most successful market centre in Portugal. Here we help clients get the home they dream of, we help homeowners find the best business solution and we help consultants get the career they're looking for!

kw_luxury.content: As part of an exclusive network of international KW Luxury agents, Sofia GalvÃ£o Group specialises in the promotion and sale of high-end real estate. We offer a service of excellence, focusing on the needs of the most demanding clients. Our experience and worldwide network allow us to offer a personalised approach and a high level of service, ensuring that each luxury property receives the upscale prominence it deserves.
kw_luxury.subtitle: Luxury Property Specialists
kw_luxury.title: We are Agent KW Luxury

international_network.content: Sofia GalvÃ£o Group is part of KW, a global network of property consultants, present on 5 continents and in more than 50 regions. As a world leader in real estate brokerage, KW offers access to an extensive network and unrivalled resources.
international_network.title: International framework

national_network.content: In Portugal, KW has 23 representations and more than 2,800 consultants and associates, providing comprehensive reach and high-quality service throughout the country. This vast network allows us to offer our customers a superior buying and selling experience.
national_network.title: National framework

about.meta_description: Sofia GalvÃ£o Group, a dedicated and demanding team that motivated by the best customer service grows and goes further every day.

mission.sub1: To be by your side in the real estate world to make the big "changes" in your life happy!
mission.title: Mission

mission_and_vision.content: Our mission is to be the number one choice for high quality real estate services throughout the country. We devotedly work to ensure that each client receives a personalised service focused on their unique needs. Our vision is to set a standard of excellence in the real estate market by offering innovative solutions and an unrivalled customer experience.
mission_and_vision.title: Mission and Vision

profile.description: I'm a marketer by training and a value creator by passion. I've worked with brands and products for years, aiming to better serve customers and offer them not only what they needed but also what best fulfilled their aspirations. I focused on people and their full potential, earning a Master's degree in Neuro-Linguistic Programming. I believe in empowering people to achieve their goals and fulfill their life purposes. I have dedicated myself to the real estate sector, applying my skills to discovering unique assets: the house, the client, the transaction, and the service. At KW, I found the right structure to develop the Sofia GalvÃ£o Group's real estate consultancy with high standards, responsibility, professionalism, and confidence. I have the market know-how to provide my clients with the best deals, the ones that make them the happiest!

team.content: Our team gathers highly qualified and experienced professionals who specialise in various market segments. We work with a network of trusted partners to provide a complete service, including legal support and financial advice. Our aim is to ensure that every client feels supported and confident throughout the buying or selling process.
team.title: Our Team

vision.sub1: To be the preferred team for clients who want to buy or sell property in the Lisbon and Porto areas, thanks to our professionalism, our capacity to generate good business and the values we profess on a daily basis.
vision.title: Vision

who.sub1: A dedicated and demanding team that, motivated by the best customer service, grows and goes further every day.
who.sub2: Focused on the professionalisation of the sector, we provide real estate consultancy with credibility, excellence and relevance.
who.title: Who are we?

blog_posts.subheader: Our blog is a source of knowledge for buyers and sellers. We include articles on best practices in the real estate market, market trends and advice for those looking to buy or sell a property. Stay informed and make safe, sound decisions by taking our content into account.

titles.main: Fill in the form to refer a member:

contribute.description: By referring someone who wants to buy or sell a home, youâ€™re kickstarting real change. Every closed deal generates a direct contribution to the mission of SGG Club, helping transform houses into dignified homes for those in need.
contribute.subtitle: A simple referral from you can change lives.
contribute.title: Contribute to the next story
contribute.value_description: This way, you create value on two fronts: you offer the people you refer top-quality real estate support, while also changing the lives of families who need your help.

dignity.description: Everyone deserves a place to live with dignity, safety, and comfort. The SGG Club was created with the mission of rebuilding lives by improving the housing conditions of those who need it most.
dignity.title: A decent home shouldnâ€™t be a dream - it should be reality

impact.subtitle: See our impact
impact.title: Story of impact generated so far

join.description: Know someone looking to buy or sell a home? Refer them to us. With this simple gesture, youâ€™re ensuring they get top-notch real estate service, while also helping provide a dignified home to someone who really needs it.
join.mission: Together, we will turn houses into homes and rebuild lives
join.subtitle: Become a member of SGG Club today
join.title: Take the first step to change a life
join.whatsapp: Send us a WhatsApp to start contributing.

know_more.help_description: Refer other members so we can make an even bigger impact together!
know_more.help_question: Do you know someone who could contribute to the cause?
know_more.rules: Read the SGG Club Regulation here
know_more.whatsapp: Send us a WhatsApp to refer members to the club.

home.meta_description: Discover SGG Club by Sofia GalvÃ£o Group - where real estate excellence meets exclusive benefits.

partners.conclusion_html: Your referral could change a life. Get in touch and be part of this change.
partners.description: SGG Clubâ€™s mission is only possible thanks to the essential collaboration of our members and ambassadors, who bring life to the impact we want to achieve.
partners.dynamic: Not just through referrals in real estate, but also by identifying people and stories in urgent need of support.
partners.second_title: Do you know someone we could help?
partners.situations: Weâ€™re always looking for real-life situations where our support can make a difference.
partners.someone: If you know someone going through hardship who could benefit from our help, reach out to us.
partners.subtitle: Together, we can create stories that change lives.
partners.title: Help us make change happen

home.subtitle: Buy and sell houses, rebuild lives
home.title: SGG Club

recent_stories.description: Discover our latest member stories and experiences
recent_stories.title: Recent Stories

rules.clarity: We believe that only with clarity can we create real, lasting impact.
rules.content:
SGG Club is an exclusive program designed to provide additional benefits to our clients...

Check here for all participation rules and conditions.
rules.intro: The SGG Clubâ€™s regulations establish clear rules for how we operate, defining the rights and responsibilities of members, the criteria for supporting families, and the principles that ensure a transparent and accountable use of funds.
rules.meta_description: Rules and guidelines for SGG Club.
rules.read_below: Below youâ€™ll find the full regulation that guides all our activity.

list.1: Current housing conditions and urgency of the situation;
list.2: The impact the intervention could have on the family's quality of life.

criteria.title: 4.3. Support will be granted based on the following criteria:

criteria.decisions: 4.4. Support decisions are made by a group of club members, ensuring transparency and fairness in the selection of beneficiaries.
criteria.decisions_html: 4.4. Support decisions are made by a group of club members, ensuring transparency and fairness in the selection of beneficiaries.
criteria.families: 4.1. SGG Club support is intended for vulnerable families, elderly people, and individuals experiencing homelessness who need housing improvements.
criteria.families_html: 4.1. SGG Club support is intended for vulnerable families, elderly people, and individuals experiencing homelessness who need housing improvements.

list.2: Social organisations or partner entities that identify cases of need.
list.3: Members and ambassadors of SGG Club.

submited_by.title: 4.2. Applications for support can be submitted by:

criteria.title: 4. Criteria for Supporting Families

events.description: 5.1. SGG Club regularly promotes events aimed at:
events.incentives: 5.2. All ambassadors are encouraged to participate in events and contribute to expanding the clubâ€™s impact.

list.2: Raising awareness about the issue of dignified housing;
list.3: Celebrating completed projects and sharing testimonies.

events.title: 5. Club Events and Initiatives

final.1: 7.1. These regulations may be adjusted as needed, with the approval of the clubâ€™s leadership.
final.2: 7.2. All actions by SGG Club must align with its values and mission, always ensuring that the impact on the community is positive and meaningful.
final.second_html: 7.2. All actions by SGG Club must align with its values and mission, always ensuring that the impact on the community is always positive and meaningful.
final.title: 7. Final Provisions

application.intro: Funds from SGG Club are used for:

list_html.1: Home renovations and repairs for people in need;
list_html.4: Development of new initiatives and partnerships to expand the clubâ€™s impact.
list_html.2: Purchase of furniture and essential equipment to improve living conditions;
list_html.3: Support to improve necessary conditions to turn a house into a home;

application.title: 3.2. Use of Funds

sources.description_html: SGG Club funds its actions through real estate referrals â€“ When a member refers someone looking to buy or sell a home, part of the transaction commission goes toward housing support for people in need.
sources.intro: SGG Club funds its actions through:
sources.title: 3.1. Sources of funding

general.definition: These regulations define the clubâ€™s operating rules, the rights and duties of members, and the criteria for supporting beneficiaries.
general.mission_html: The mission of SGG Club is to positively contribute to improving housing conditions for those most in need, by mobilising resources and people to create dignified homes.
general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.values_html: The club operates based on the values of dignity, solidarity, value creation, and sharing.

list.1: Respect the club's values and principles;
list.4: Identify people or situations that may benefit from the clubâ€™s support.
list.2: Contribute actively within their means, whether through referrals or volunteering;
list.3: Act with transparency and ethics in all interactions related to the club;

choice.description: Ambassadors are chosen directly by those in charge of the SGG Club, based on their involvement and active contribution.
choice.subtitle: Choosing Ambassadors:

ambassadors.description: Ambassadors are characterised by their active involvement, regular commitment, and initiative in helping grow the club - mainly through the continuous referral of real estate deals and identification of situations that may require the clubâ€™s intervention. They are members who consistently propose and develop new ideas and actions, taking greater responsibility in achieving the clubâ€™s mission.

list.1: Regular participation in meetings and initiatives;
list.2: Proposing new ideas and actions to enhance the clubâ€™s impact;
list.3: Supporting the clubâ€™s leaders in promoting its mission and values.

loss_of_status.description: An ambassador may be reinstated if he or she moves significantly away from the core of the club's involvement, subject to a decision by those responsible.
loss_of_status.subtitle: Loss of Status:

ambassadors.title: Ambassadors

members.description: Members are individuals selected to be part of SGG Club, but whose participation is not yet fully active. They are in a pre-membership phase and, once they identify or refer a viable real estate opportunity, they will become ambassadors.
members.title: Members

rights.intro: SGG Club members have the right to:

list.1: Take part in initiatives promoted by the club;
list.4: Receive regular updates about the clubâ€™s activities and development.
list.2: Follow the supported projects and the impact generated;
list.3: Propose new actions and initiatives aligned with the clubâ€™s mission;

rights.title: 2.2. Members' Rights

who_can.intro: Anyone can become a member of SGG Club:

list.1: Individuals who want to support the cause by referring real estate purchase or sale deals;
list.2: Companies and professionals in the real estate, construction or home services sectors who wish to contribute or partner;
list.3: Anyone who identifies with the clubâ€™s values and wants to support its mission.

who_can.title: 2.1. Who can be a member

transparency.description: 6.1. SGG Club commits to maintaining full transparency in the management of funds and in all actions carried out.
transparency.description_html: 6.1. SGG Club commits to maintaining full transparency in the management of funds and in all actions carried out.

reports.description: 6.2. An accountability report will be published regularly, including:

list.1: Amounts raised through real estate referrals and partnerships;
list.2: Funded projects and the impact generated;

transparency.title: 6. Transparency and Accountability

rules.title: SGG Club Regulations
rules.transparency: Transparency and commitment are the foundation of our mission.

club.rules_description: Learn about SGG Club terms and conditions.

invest.description: The possibility of making payments available according to the stages of development and construction.
invest.title: Phased investment

own.description: Buying at the planning stage gives you the guarantee that the property is delivered pristine and never-used, and the certainty that you will be the first owner.
own.title: You'll be the first owner of your new home

perspective.description: When you buy a house on the drawing board, the investment you make is usually less than the investment you would have to make if it had already been completed. This means that your house, from the moment it is ready, already maximises your investment.
perspective.title: Expectation on better return on investment

warranty.description: A new property comes with a construction warranty, ensuring no need for improvements in the coming years.
warranty.title: Construction warranty

yours.description: Buying at the planning stage grants the future owner the chance to make changes to materials and sometimes to the layout, so that their future home matches their needs and preferences.
yours.title: Customised property by your standards

enterprises.meta_description: The best developments in Portugal to buy with Sofia GalvÃ£o Group.
enterprises.subheader: Why to buy at the Planning Stage?

subtitle.description: Discover our real estate development projects, offering unique investment opportunities. With buy-at-the-planning-stage options, you can personalize your property and invest in properties with high potential for capital appreciation. Our team provides detailed information on each development, including location, payment plans, and return potential.
subtitle.title: Investment Opportunities

faq.description: We answer the most frequently asked questions about the process of buying and selling real estate, including doubts about financing, necessary documentation and the stages of the process. We provide clear and practical guidance to help clear up any doubts and ensure an informed and safe experience.
faq.meta_description: Frequently asked questions about real estate and the services provided by Sofia GalvÃ£o Group.

5.description: We use marketing strategies that maximise the exposure of your property, ensuring that it reaches the right buyers or tenants.
5.title: Effective Marketing

1.description: Years of experience in the real estate market, with dozens of successfully closed deals.
1.title: Experience

4.description: We guarantee that all legal issues are handled safely and accurately.
4.title: Legal Support

2.description: We monitor every stage of the process, ensuring that everything is done correctly and efficiently.
2.title: Complete Service

3.description: Our clients trust our ability to close deals quickly, at the best price and in the right way for all parties.
3.title: Proven results

reason.title: Why should I choose Sofia GalvÃ£o Group?

5.answer: Yes. In addition to taxes, such as the Property Acquisition Tax (IMT) and the Stamp Duty, there are also costs for the final deed and the land registry. Our commission is competitive and transparent, covering all the services involved in promoting, monitoring, and managing the sales process.
5.title: Are there any costs associated with selling?

1.answer: Selling a property is a process that requires knowledge of the market, promotion strategies and attention to legal and bureaucratic details. The Sofia GalvÃ£o Group offers a complete service, from the accurate assessment of the property's value to the final negotiation, ensuring that the client gets the best price and a quick and smooth sale. With extensive experience and a solid network of contacts, we maximise your chances of success.
1.title: Why to hire Sofia GalvÃ£o Group to sell my house?

4.answer: We combine digital marketing, state of the art property platforms, home staging, professional photography and virtual tours. These techniques maximise your property's exposure to the right buyers, resulting in more interest and generally faster sales.
4.title: How does Sofia GalvÃ£o Group promote my property?

2.answer: The first step is to ensure that all the property's documentation is in order. This includes documents such as the land registry certificate, the permanent certificate, and the energy certificate. The Sofia GalvÃ£o Group will help you ensure that everything is correct and prepare a detailed evaluation to define the appropriate sale price.
2.title: What are the first steps to selling my house?

3.answer: The time it takes to sell a house depends on various factors, such as the state of the market and the price of the property. However, with a personalised approach and advanced marketing strategies, many properties are sold in less time than the market average.
3.title: How long does the selling process take?

5.answer: Yes. Our team is with you every step of the way, from finding or searching for properties, negotiating offers and even signing the deed or lease. This way we guarantee total support from the first minute to the last!
5.title: Will the property consultant accompany me to the end of the process?

1.answer: Exclusivity means that Sofia GalvÃ£o Group will be the only company responsible for promoting your property, but we do not operate exclusively to make the sale. In order to find the best solutions for our clients, we work in partnership with all the real estate agents who have a valid brokerage license (AMI) and who may have a client interested in your property. This ensures that your property can be bought by any client looking for a home directly or who is being represented by a real estate consultant. However, the exclusive promotion allows us to devote more resources and attention to your property, guaranteeing a more efficient service and personalised follow-up until the end of the process.
1.title: What is exclusivity in property brokerage?

4.answer: Times vary according to the type of transaction and market conditions. However, with Sofia GalvÃ£o Group's personalised approach, many of our clients are able to close deals in less time than the market average.
4.title: How long does the whole selling, buying or letting process take?

2.answer: Sure! Our team is able to manage simultaneous sale and purchase processes, ensuring that the transition between properties is smooth and uncomplicated. We facilitate both processes, offering integrated solutions.
2.title: Can I sell and buy at the same time?

3.answer: Home staging is the preparation of a property to make it more attractive to potential buyers or tenants. It involves tidiness, decoration and small details that allow your property to stand out both in photos and during visits. With home staging, your property stands out on the market, increases its attractiveness and is generally sold or rented out more quickly.
3.title: What is home staging and why is it important?

5.answer: Sure! We have partnerships with several banks and can help you find the best financing conditions for your purchase.
5.title: Can I get help with bank finance?

1.answer: Buying a house is one of the most important financial decisions, and Sofia GalvÃ£o Group will ensure that you make the right choice. We have access to a vast network of properties, including exclusive ones that are not advertised on real estate portals. We offer support at every stage, from the search to the final negotiation and the signing of the final deed.
1.title: Why to choose Sofia GalvÃ£o Group to buy a house?

4.answer: In addition to the price of the property, there are costs such as the Property Acquisition Tax (IMT), the Stamp Duty, the final deed, and the land registry. The Sofia GalvÃ£o Group helps you calculate all these costs to ensure you are aware of all the amounts involved.
4.title: What are the costs involved in buying a house?

2.answer: The first step is to identify your needs and define your budget. Based on this, our team will help you narrow down to a suitable property shortlist. Once you've chosen a house, we'll guide you through the process of checking the documentation and preparing the offer.
2.title: What is the first step in buying a house?

3.answer: We make a detailed assessment of the market, comparing similar properties in the same area. We also analyse the condition of the property to ensure that the asking price reflects the reality of the market.
3.title: How do I know if a property is fairly priced?

5.answer: For the tenant, the costs usually include two months' rent and one month's security deposit.
5.title: What are the costs associated with renting?

1.answer: Whether you're a tenant or a landlord, Sofia GalvÃ£o Group makes the leasing process easier, safer and more efficient. For landlords, we promote the property effectively, helping to find the right tenant. For tenants, we ensure that the letting process is simple and that the property complies with all legal obligations.
1.title: Why to choose Sofia GalvÃ£o Group to rent a house or to find tenants?

4.answer: It's not always necessary, but in some cases the landlord may require a guarantor as an additional guarantee. This requirement varies from contract to contract.
4.title: Do I need a guarantor to rent a house?

2.answer: In the case of tenants, documents such as proof of income, ID and, in some cases, a guarantor are required. In the case of landlords, it is important to ensure that the property has up-to-date documentation, including the energy certificate and the mandatory insurance.
2.title: What documents are needed to rent a property?

3.answer: The rent is set on the basis of a market appraisal, considering the location of the property and comparing it with other similar rentals in the area. Based on this assessment, we help you to define a fair and competitive value.
3.title: How is the rent determined?

beliefs.local: We believe that property brokerage is a local business driven by property consultants.
beliefs.partners: We believe that our real estate consultants should be treated as business partners.
beliefs.people: We believe that being in business with the right people makes a difference.
beliefs.profit: We believe that making a profit is paramount.
beliefs.reputation: We believe that no transaction can jeopardise our reputation.
beliefs.title: Beliefs

first_paragraph.bottom: KW has a total of 23 representations and more than 2,000 consultants and associates in Portugal.
first_paragraph.middle: Today, around the world more than 165,000 consultants and more than 1,000 Market Centers are KW affiliates.
first_paragraph.top: KW operates on the principle that if you focus all your resources on building your consultants' businesses, they will, in return, help build a company that exceeds all expectations. With this philosophy in practice, we are transforming the real estate landscape.

kw.meta_description: Sofia GalvÃ£o Group in partnership with Kw Portugal.
kw.more: Find out more about KW Portugal

perspectives.agent: Keller Williams thinks like a success agent, acts like a consultant/trainer providing models/systems, technology, products and services that enhance productivity and profitability.
perspectives.brand: We support the agent to develop their brand and not the opposite.
perspectives.consulting: We are a company built by Consultants, for Consultants.
perspectives.growth: We believe that we will grow as a company the more we are able to promote the growth of the people who work with us.
perspectives.learn: At Keller Williams we believe in learning for results and not in learning for learning's sake.
perspectives.people: What will make Keller Williams better in the long run is the way people think.
perspectives.tech: We are a Technology-driven Consulting and Training company dedicated to the real estate brokerage business.
perspectives.title: Perspectives

kw.subheader: A company made up of consultants for consultants!

sell.exclusive: We work on your home with exclusivity and dedication, and we perform close monitoring throughout the entire process.

list.agencies: Sharing the sale with all agencies in the market.
list.kw: Exclusive access to the entire KW PT network.
list.market: Market research - preparation of comparative market analyses and characterisation reports of the area under consideration.
list.portal: Diffusion on the most important national and international real estate portals.
list.warranty: Guaranteed implementation of industry regulated processes and procedures.

sell.meta_description: Sell properties in Portugal with real estate consultant Sofia GalvÃ£o from Sofia GalvÃ£o Group.

paragraph.bottom: Our aim is to find you the best Client in the shortest amount of time, and for that purpose we offer:
paragraph.middle: We offer a consultancy service tailored to your needs, focusing on promotion strategy, publicity, and the best negotiation.
paragraph.top: We guarantee the best deal for the sale of your home.

sell.subheader: Find out how much your home is worth.

legal_financial_support.description: We recommend advisory services on financing options and legal assistance, certifying that all legal and bureaucratic issues are handled competently. Our network of trusted partners is readily available to ensure security in all transactions.
legal_financial_support.title: Legal and Financial Assistance

market_analysis.description: We carry out detailed market analyses to ensure that our clients make informed purchases at fair prices. We specialise in negotiations and work to ensure that you get the best possible conditions
market_analysis.title: Market Analysis and Negotiation

personalized_consulting.description: Weâ€™ve acknowledged that each buyer is unique. That's why we offer personalised consultancy tailored to your specific objectives. Whether you're looking for your first home, a second home or an investment, we provide the support you need to make informed decisions. From choosing the location to negotiating the price, we're with you every step of the way
personalized_consulting.title: Personalised Consultancy

post_purchase_support.description: Our service doesn't end with the purchase. We offer ongoing support after the transaction, helping with the move, setting up the property and any other needs that may arise. We are here to ensure that the transition to your new home is smooth and hassle-free.
post_purchase_support.title: Post-purchase follow-up

property_variety.description: Explore a wide range of options, from urban flats to luxury villas, as well as commercial properties and investment opportunities, and find the property that matches your needs and preferences. Our team will help you identify opportunities and seal the best deal.
property_variety.title: Variety of Properties

virtual_tours_visits.description: We offer detailed virtual tours and organise face-to-face visits so that you can explore the properties in detail. Our team is always available to answer any questions and provide additional information.
virtual_tours_visits.title: Virtual Tours and Visits

for_buyers.subtitle: Personalised Support for Real Estate Purchases
for_buyers.title: For Buyers

accurate_evaluation.description: We carry out detailed evaluations and develop a personalised sales strategy tailored to the unique characteristics of each property. We use an approach based on market data and comparative analyses to ensure that the value of your property is maximised and can attract buyers.
accurate_evaluation.title: Accurate Evaluation and Sales Strategy

full_service.description: Selling a property can be a complex process, but at Sofia GalvÃ£o Group, we simplify every stage. We offer a complete sales service, from property evaluation and marketing strategy to formalisation of the sale and completion of the deed, ensuring that your property is sold in the simplest, fastest way and at the best price.
full_service.title: Complete Follow-Up

home_staging.description: We offer home staging services to prepare your property for the market. This includes advice on decoration, tidiness and showcasing to maximise the property's visual appeal. Proper preparation can make a significant difference to buyer perception and the final sale price.
home_staging.title: Home Staging and Preparation

marketing.description: To promote our clients' properties, we use a comprehensive marketing strategy that includes professional multimedia reporting, virtual tours, digital campaigns on various platforms, social media outreach and proximity marketing (flyers; newsletter; outdoors advertisement plaque). We have a vast network of contacts at both national and international levels, as well as a presence on the world's main real estate portals. This approach aims to increase the visibility of our properties and attract qualified buyers, guaranteeing a quick and efficient sale.
marketing.title: Effective Property Marketing

negotiation_legal_support.description: With an experienced negotiating team, we ensure that each transaction is carried out under the best conditions. In addition, we recommend full legal support to guarantee that all legal aspects are handled with due diligence.
negotiation_legal_support.title: Negotiation and legal support

post_sale_support.description: Our service doesn't end with the sale. We offer ongoing support after the transaction, helping to clarify any doubts or questions that may arise. We are here to ensure that the sale of your home is smooth and hassle-free.
post_sale_support.title: After-sales follow-up

visits_qualification.description: We have a vast network of national and international contacts to ensure that potential buyers get to know their home. We organise visits in such a way that they don't interfere with your routine and we carry out a rigorous qualification service of interested parties to ensure that they meet all the conditions which enable you to get the best deal on the sale of your property.
visits_qualification.title: Visits and Client Qualification

house_lens.description: We carry out professional and detailed evaluations to determine the fair market value of your property. We use a data-driven approach, including analysing market matchings and current trends. This service is essential for owners looking to sell or rent out their property, as well as for buyers looking to ensure they are making the right investment.
house_lens.title: Property evaluations

house_trees.description: At Sofia GalvÃ£o Group, we offer a full range of real estate consultancy services, including buying, selling and renting properties. Our service begins with a detailed analysis of the market, followed by a personalised strategy for each client. Our team specialises in identifying opportunities in the market and negotiating the best conditions, ensuring that clients get maximum value from every transaction.
house_trees.title: Real Estate Management and Consultancy

services.meta_description: As professionals in the real estate market, get to know Sofia GalvÃ£o Group's services here.

tailor_house.description: We offer personalised solutions for all your real estate needs, guaranteeing a premium, high-quality service. From energy certification, architecture, construction, refurbishing, to professional cleaning, efficient moving process, gardening and interior design, we provide a complete and integrated service. We work with trusted partners to ensure that every detail is handled with care and excellence, providing an unrivalled real estate experience.
tailor_house.subtitle: Personalised Solutions for Every Real Estate Need
tailor_house.title: Tailor House | Home 360Âº

text.bottom:
Get to know some of them.
If you would like to know more, please
text.top: As professionals in the real estate market, all the services related to real estate mediation and consultancy are within the scope of our activity for your benefit.

If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law.

Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

accuracy.content: The materials appearing on Sofia GalvÃ£o Group's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Sofia GalvÃ£o Group may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice. However Sofia GalvÃ£o Group does not make any commitment to update the materials.
